page.title: 18Trade
page.content: Barrow Hill itself has a small supermarket,a post office, a fish and chip shop, a pet shop and a hairdressers.A survey done by the children of Barrow Hill school showed that the vast majority of parents shopped in Staveley where there is avery large supermarket with easy access and free parking.There are many other shops and a thriving small market selling fruit and vegetables and clothing.Some parents go to Chesterfield on Saturdays to the very large market.On special occasions shopping is done in the nearby city of Sheffield.
